200°C
Directions

This digital experiment models the catalytic decomposition of n-propanol in a steady-state reactor. n-Propanol decomposes by two pathways and both liquid and gases products form. Use mass balances and measurements of the liquid and gas flow rates to determine how much n-propanol reactors by each pathway.

About

This simulation was created in the Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering at University of Colorado Boulder for LearnChemE.com by Pramod Kumar Ajmeera under the direction of Professors J. Will Medlin and John L. Falconer. It was prepared with financial support from the National Science Foundation (DUE 2336987 and 2336988) in collaboration with Washington State University. Address any questions or comments to LearnChemE@gmail.com.
